WLINTA

Our community

We welcome everyone one from the WLINTA community to our events.

WLINTA stands for Women, Lesbian, Intersex, Non-binary, Transgender (all transgender people), Agender and anyone else marginalized in patriarchal society who is not included in the previous labels.

We want to create a safer space open for anyone in this community. Cis hetero MENtalities are not invited to our event.
